"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"One of our cruisers has been attacked by
the Armada of Demise.
The ship has been incapacitated, and is
at risk of being captured.
Hurry and rescue it by eliminating enemy
forces on the deck.
In addition, enemy fighters have been
detected in space. Beware of their attacks.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"Now beginning the launch sequence.
Your objective is to rescue a friendly ship that has been attacked by enemy units."

"Thanks to the enemy's attack, the friendly ship been incapacitated.
You will have to defeat the enemies to free it."

"The ship is about to be captured.
Assemble on the deck and destroy the enemy units attempting to capture it."
